name: In Memoriam (Feral Poodles)
description:
“She said he's been abnormally forgetful lately and kept complaining about headaches, and now he's been missing for the past few days. Weird thing is, I did some digging and I couldn't find anything on the guy at all. It's like he never existed.” A non-linear narrative animation experience. Explore an abandoned office through the lense of the objects that were left behind, and piece together what happened using a strange device that can extract the memories from those objects. 

Controls: Move with WASD or arrow keys. Pick up objects by holding the left mouse button, and let go to drop them.
